artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Daikokuya Kichinosuke; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 62; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 304.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: male figure with head turned to R, clutching lapels with PR hand within round cartouche framed with reed wreath; figure has white robe with blue decorations outlined with zigzags; shaved eyebrows and crown of head; small, delicate flowers in background outside of wreath; small glass wind chime with paper hangs from wreath
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | Carver’s seal: 深彫長 {Fuka hori Chō} | Censor seal: 戌五改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Recollections of Fashionable Actors (Fūga wazaogi shinobu 風哥俳優志野婦)
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
title: Actor Bandō Hikosaburō V
